name: codex-copilot
description: Codex Copilot for translation support. Includes chat, comments, and inline AI text completions.

translators-copilot.llmEndpoint.title: LLM Endpoint
translators-copilot.llmEndpoint.description: The endpoint for the completion API. Choose between local LLM or OpenAI endpoints. We would suggest using LM Studio (https://lmstudio.ai) for a local LLM.

translators-copilot.api_key.title: API Key
translators-copilot.api_key.description: Your own openai API key. Ignorable for local LLM.

translators-copilot.model.title: LLM Model
translators-copilot.model.description: Model name selected for inference. Ignorable for local LLM.

translators-copilot.max_tokens.title: Max Tokens
translators-copilot.max_tokens.description: The maximum number of output tokens for the completion API.

translators-copilot.temperature.title: Temperature
translators-copilot.temperature.description: The randomness level of output generation. A higher value leads to more random outputs.

translators-copilot.main_chat_language.title: Main Chat Language
enum: မြန်မာဘာသာ (Burmese)
translators-copilot.main_chat_language.description: The main language used for the chat interface.

translators-copilot.chatSystemMessage.title: Rules for AI (System Message)
translators-copilot.chatSystemMessage.default: This is a chat between a helpful Bible translation assistant and a Bible translator. The assistant will provide helpful answers and suggestions to the translator, often relying on the translator's current project and reference resources. The translator will ask questions and provide context to the assistant. The translator's aim is to be consistent and faithful in a fairly literalistic rendering of the source text.
translators-copilot.chatSystemMessage.description: The system message controlling the behavior of the chat system. You can customize this message to fit your needs, or ask the copilot to translate it for you into your preferred interface language.

walkthroughs.title: Set up Local/Offline Translator's Copilot
walkthroughs.description: A simple walkthrough to help you set up a large language model on your device to benefit from the Copilot feature.

steps.title: Download LM Studio
steps.description:
Download LM Studio to get a local LLM running to power your Translator's Copilot.

[Download LM Studio](https://lmstudio.ai)

steps.title: Download Model
steps.description: Download the model you want to use for your Copilot. Not sure which one to try? Try searching LM Studio for `TheBloke/neural-chat-7B-v3-1-GGUF` (note the specific file you want is the `neural-chat-7b-v3-1.Q4_K_S.gguf` variant).

steps.title: Initialize Downloaded Model
steps.description: Load the model you want to use for your Copilot. Click on the model dropdown at the top-center of the LM Studio screen, then select the model you downloaded (e.g., `neural-chat-7b-v3-1.Q4_K_S.gguf`).

steps.title: Start AI Model
steps.description: Make the AI model you downloaded accessible by the Translator's Copilot by clicking on the green play 'Start Server' button in LM Studio.

steps.title: Set Main Chat Language
steps.description:
Set your main chat language (also accessible in the Translator's Copilot settings).

[Set Chat Language](command:translators-copilot.setMainChatLanguage)

steps.title: Try Chatting with the Translator's Copilot
steps.description: Try chatting with the Translator's Copilot by clicking on the chat button in the sidebar, then clicking on the 'Chat' button in the top-right of the chat window.

steps.title: Try Inline Completions
steps.description: Try inline completions with the Translator's Copilot by clicking on the chat button in the sidebar, then clicking on the 'Chat' button in the top-right of the chat window.

walkthroughs.title: Set up OpenAI Translator's Copilot
walkthroughs.description: A simple walkthrough to help you set up a large language model on your device to benefit from the Copilot feature.

steps.title: Get OpenAI API Key
steps.description:
Get your OpenAI API key from the OpenAI website.

[Get OpenAI API Key](https://platform.openai.com/signup)

steps.title: Set OpenAI API Key
steps.description:
Set your OpenAI API key in the Translator's Copilot settings.

[Set API Key](command:translators-copilot.setLLMApiKey)

steps.title: Set Main Chat Language
steps.description:

steps.description: Try chatting with the Translator's Copilot by clicking on the chat button in the sidebar, then clicking on the 'Chat' button in the top-right of the chat window.
